description: Announces the time and date in selected timezones. Use the Settings dialog to set timezones you want to hear. After you do this, press NVDA+ALT+UP/DOWN ARROW to cycle through your timezone ring and hear times in your selected timezones.

translations.description: Announces the time and date in selected timezones. Use the Settings dialog to set timezones you want to hear. After you do this, press NVDA+ALT+UP/DOWN ARROW to cycle through your timezone ring and hear times in your selected timezones.

translations.displayName: Anúncio de horas em diferentes fusos horários
translations.description: Announces the time and date in selected timezones. Use the Settings dialog to set timezones you want to hear. After you do this, press NVDA+ALT+UP/DOWN ARROW to cycle through your timezone ring and hear times in your selected timezones.

translations.displayName: Anúncio de horas em diferentes fusos horários
translations.description: Announces the time and date in selected timezones. Use the Settings dialog to set timezones you want to hear. After you do this, press NVDA+ALT+UP/DOWN ARROW to cycle through your timezone ring and hear times in your selected timezones.

Объявляет время и дату в выбранных часовых поясах. Используйте меню настроек, чтобы установить часовые пояса, которые вы хотите прослушать. После этого нажмите NVDA+ALT+ стрелки ВВЕРХ/ ВНИЗ, чтобы переключаться по кольцу часовых поясов и услышать время в выбранных часовых поясах.

Announces the time and date in selected timezones. Use the Settings dialog to set timezones you want to hear. After you do this, press NVDA+ALT+UP/DOWN ARROW to cycle through your timezone ring and hear times in your selected timezones.
